mapper.select: select id as "ID", mid as "MID", pwd as "PWD", username as "USERNAME", phone as "PHONE", email as "EMAIL", nickname as "NICKNAME", img as "IMG", is_deleted as "IS_DELETED", created_date as "CREATED_DATE" from member where mid=#{mid}
select my_id as "MY_ID", friend_id as "FRIEND_ID", status as "STATUS", create_date as "CREATE_DATE" from friend where my_id=#{mid}
